about_the_game:
BQM, the dungeon creator where you can make and play original mazes is back with new and improved graphics! You can now turn your ideas into playable dungeons like those in puzzle RPGs, without the need for any complex knowledge. Endless adventures await you in this remastered version!

There are so many elements you can use! Switches, doors, NPCs, currency systems, and more! How will one level up when playing your dungeon? Pushing boxes around? Dodging traps? Defeating monsters? It's all up to you!

The game includes some premade challenge dungeons, and of course you can play dungeons created by people from all over the world as well as have them play your own! You don't need to know how to write code—even the most complex systems are easy to implement. The only limit is your own creativity!

The remastered version also includes all parts from BQM's two DLCs: SAMURAI ERA and CYBER CENTURY.

See the table below for the list of playable dungeons included in the remastered version.
detailed_description:
BQM, the dungeon creator where you can make and play original mazes is back with new and improved graphics! You can now turn your ideas into playable dungeons like those in puzzle RPGs, without the need for any complex knowledge. Endless adventures await you in this remastered version!

There are so many elements you can use! Switches, doors, NPCs, currency systems, and more! How will one level up when playing your dungeon? Pushing boxes around? Dodging traps? Defeating monsters? It's all up to you!

The game includes some premade challenge dungeons, and of course you can play dungeons created by people from all over the world as well as have them play your own! You don't need to know how to write code—even the most complex systems are easy to implement. The only limit is your own creativity!

The remastered version also includes all parts from BQM's two DLCs: SAMURAI ERA and CYBER CENTURY.

See the table below for the list of playable dungeons included in the remastered version.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS X 10 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Graphics: Radeon pro 560K
  • Storage: 350 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: MacOS X 10 or later
  • Processor: Apple M1
  • Graphics: Apple M1
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: BQM - BlockQuest Maker Remastered Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 1200 ／ Intel Core i5-7500
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 560 with 4GB VRAM ／ NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti with 4GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 350 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: MD Ryzen 5 3600 ／ Intel Core i7 8700
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 5700 ／ NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Play and create your very own dungeons in BlockQuest Maker: Remastered, a dungeon creator full of all kinds of fun gimmicks!
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Latin America, Portuguese - Brazil, Polish, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Portugal
